  @verbatim
  ******************************************************************************
  * @file    st_readme.txt
  * @author  SRA
  * @brief   This file lists the main modification done by STMicroelectronics on
  *          IOTA library for integration with STM32Cube solution.
  ******************************************************************************

  *    software, must execute solely and exclusively on microcontroller or

  *    this license is void and will automatically terminate your rights under

=======
### 01-December-2022 ###
========================
   + iota.c v0.4.0 (https://github.com/iotaledger/iota.c) customized version for STM32Cube solution.
   + Introduce ThreadX wrapper for malloc

=======
### 01-December-2021 ###
========================
   + iota.c v0.3.0 (https://github.com/iotaledger/iota.c) customized version for STM32Cube solution.
   + Aligned to commit a1b32f7

=======
### 28-July-2021 ###
========================
   + iota.c v0.0.2 (https://github.com/iotaledger/iota.c) customized version for STM32Cube solution.
   + Aligned to commit bbb38f6

=======
### 10-March-2021 ###
========================
   + iota.c v0.0.1 (https://github.com/iotaledger/iota.c) customized version for STM32Cube solution.

=======
### 21-June-2019 ###
========================
   + IOTA v1.0.0 customized version for STM32Cube solution.


 * <h3><center>&copy; COPYRIGHT STMicroelectronics</center></h3>
 */
